languages.text: {n}Паскаль замирает, и из его {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} льется тихий шепот:{/n} "Запрос отклонен. Я не имею санкции восседать на командном троне люминодиакона. Подобный поступок будет расценен как богохульство".

traits.locale_text: {n}Паскаль замирает, и из его {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} льется тихий шепот:{/n} "Запрос отклонен. Я не имею санкции восседать на командном троне люминодиакона. Подобный поступок будет расценен как богохульство".

languages.text: {n}Pasqal freezes, and a quiet whisper comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "Request denied. I am not authorised to sit upon the lumenodeacon's command throne. Such an act would be considered a sacrilege."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль замирает, и из его {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} льется тихий шепот:{/n} "Запрос отклонен. Я не имею санкции восседать на командном троне люминодиакона. Подобный поступок будет расценен как богохульство".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal freezes, and a quiet whisper comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "Request declined. I am not authorised to sit upon the lumenodeacon's command throne. Such an act will be considered a sacrilege."

{n}Pasqal freezes, and a quiet whisper comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "Request declined. I am not authorised to sit upon the lumenodeacon's command throne. Such an act will be considered a sacrilege."

{n}Pasqal freezes, and a quiet whisper comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "Request denied. I am not authorised to sit upon the lumenodeacon's command throne. Such an act would be considered a sacrilege."

{n}Pasqal freezes, and a quiet whisper comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "Request denied. I am not authorised to sit upon the lumenodeacon's command throne. Such an act would be considered a sacrilege."

{n}Pasqal freezes, and a quiet whisper comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "Request denied. I am not authorised to sit upon the lumenodeacon's command throne. Such an act would be considered a sacrilege."

{n}Pasqal freezes, and a quiet whisper comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "Request denied. I am not authorised to sit upon the lumenodeacon's command throne. Such an act would be considered a sacrilege."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal erstarrt und ein leises Flüstern ertönt aus seinem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}:{/n} "Anfrage abgelehnt. Ich bin nicht autorisiert, auf dem Kommandothron des Lumenodiakons Platz zu nehmen. Ein solcher Akt würde als Sakrileg gewertet werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal freezes, and a quiet whisper comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "Request denied. I am not authorised to sit upon the lumenodeacon's command throne. Such an act would be considered a sacrilege."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal erstarrt und ein leises Flüstern ertönt aus seinem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}:{/n} "Anfrage abgelehnt. Ich bin nicht autorisiert, auf dem Kommandothron des Lumenodiakons Platz zu nehmen. Ein solcher Akt würde als Sakrileg gewertet werden."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal s'immobilise et un murmure s'échappe de son {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} :{/n} « Requête refusée. Je ne suis pas habilité à m'asseoir sur le trône de commandement du luminodiacre. Un tel acte serait considéré comme un sacrilège. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal freezes, and a quiet whisper comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "Request denied. I am not authorised to sit upon the lumenodeacon's command throne. Such an act would be considered a sacrilege."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal s'immobilise et un murmure s'échappe de son {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} :{/n} « Requête refusée. Je ne suis pas habilité à m'asseoir sur le trône de commandement du luminodiacre. Un tel acte serait considéré comme un sacrilège. »

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡僵住了，他的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}装置发出了安静的低语。{/n}“请求已拒绝。我无权坐在通明助祭的指挥宝座上，擅自坐上宝座会被视为亵渎行为。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal freezes, and a quiet whisper comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "Request denied. I am not authorised to sit upon the lumenodeacon's command throne. Such an act would be considered a sacrilege."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡僵住了，他的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}装置发出了安静的低语。{/n}“请求已拒绝。我无权坐在通明助祭的指挥宝座上，擅自坐上宝座会被视为亵渎行为。”

languages.text: {n}パスカルは動きを止め、{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}から静かに小さく言葉を発する。{/n}「要求は拒否された。自分にはルーメン助祭のコマンドスローンに座る権限はありません。そのような行為は冒涜とみなされます」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal freezes, and a quiet whisper comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "Request denied. I am not authorised to sit upon the lumenodeacon's command throne. Such an act would be considered a sacrilege."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは動きを止めて、{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}から静かに小さく言葉を発する。{/n}「要求は拒否された。私にルーメン助祭のコマンドスローンに座る権限はない。そのような行為は冒涜とみなされる」

languages.text: {n}Pasqal se queda inmóvil, y un susurro sale de su {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g},{/n} «Petición denegada. No estoy autorizado a sentarme en el Trono de mando del lumidiácono. Un acto así se consideraría un sacrilegio».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal freezes, and a quiet whisper comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "Request denied. I am not authorised to sit upon the lumenodeacon's command throne. Such an act would be considered a sacrilege."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal se queda inmóvil, y un susurro sale de su {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g},{/n} «Petición denegada. No estoy autorizado a sentarme en el Trono de mando del lumidiácono. Un acto así se consideraría un sacrilegio».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal donakalıyor, {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksundan{/g} kısık bir fısıltı duyuluyor.{/n} "Talep reddedildi. Lümendiyakozun komuta tahtına oturma yetkim yok. Böyle bir eylem, kutsala hürmetsizlik sayılır."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal freezes, and a quiet whisper comes from his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g},{/n} "Request denied. I am not authorised to sit upon the lumenodeacon's command throne. Such an act would be considered a sacrilege."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal donakalıyor ve {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g}undan kısık bir fısıltı duyuluyor.{/n} "Talep reddedildi. Lümendiyakozun komuta tahtına oturma yetkim yok. Aksi takdirde günah işlemiş olurum."
